title.narrative: Opportunities for Dutch -Colombian cooperation on Circular Economy 2022 – 2026

description.narrative: The overall purpose of this study is to outline the best approach for Dutch -Colombian cooperation on Circular Economy in key priority themes: agriculture, water, mobility, waste and renewable energy. The results of this project contribute to the systematization of the progress of the implementation of the National Strategy for Circular Economy of Colombia 2022-2026; while determining concrete opportunities for bilateral cooperation in the priority sectors of the embassy, in particular where the Netherlands can provide an added value to enable sustainable local economic development. The project enables the possibility to create high value partnerships across public and private sectors and to establish synergies with international cooperation towards circular solutions in Colombia, which will contribute to identify alternatives for a sustainable development of the local private sector. In doing so, the project also identifies opportunities for involvement of the knowledge and innovation of the private sector of the Netherlands and Colombia. The project has a positive impact on:• SDG 8: Inclusive and sustainable economic growth; • SDG 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the partnership for sustainable development.
